synthesis_conditions.comments: Quantitative yield of water-soluble (NH4)2[ReF6] salt using molten NH4HF2 as a fluoride source.
Metathesis reaction. Elemental Analysis (%) calcd for C48H44F6O2P2Re: C 56.80, H 4.37, F 11.23; found: C 56.61, H 4.22, F 11.18.

synthesis_conditions.precursors: (PPh4)2[ReF6]路2 H2O, NiCl2路6 H2O or Zn(NO3)2路6 H2O, 1-vinylimidazole (viz)
synthesis_conditions.comments: Elemental Analysis (%) calcd for C20H24F6N8ZnRe (2): C 32.37, H 3.26, N 15.10; found: C 32.65, H 3.13, N 15.05. Elemental Analysis (%) calcd for C20H24F6N8NiRe (3): C 32.67, H 3.29, N 15.24, F 15.50; found: C 32.69, H 3.20, N 15.20, F 15.36.
